DOC.brief_summary: The purpose project investigate effect Kinesio tape muscle strength lower trapezius people shoulder symptom decrease muscle strength lower trapezius - randomize controlled trial .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Kinesio Taping Muscle Strength Lower Trapezius
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study investigate effect recoil tape 0-30 % tension , use one application Kinesio tape muscle fiber low trapezius origin insertion . The participant divide intervention group ( tap ) control group ( intervention ) . Muscle strength test perform immediately tap ( 20-30 minute ) group use hand-held dynamometer measurement ( MicroFET 3 ) . Work base follow hypothesis : `` Kinesio tap use recoil tap provide increase isometric muscle strength lower trapezius immediately application '' .
DOC.criteria: Shoulder problem Low muscle strength lower trapezius Positive manual recoiltest lower trapezius Shoulder surgery < 3 month Pathology shoulder related tumor , fracture , neurology , rupture tendon
